titleStmt.title: The art of divine meditation, or, A discourse of the nature, necessity, and excellency thereof with motives to, and rules for the better performance of that most important Christian duty : in several sermons on Gen. 24:63 / by Edmund Calamy ...
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, and are to be sold at his shop ... and by J. Collier ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
